channel.title: Comments on: New maps, gameplay, features and chat – the next evolution of Tower Storm is finally here

item.title: By: Alessandro Rossetti
item.dc:creator: Alessandro Rossetti
item.description: Hi, i find your name really nice but creating a lobby it's often problematic! There are other bugs, after a 25 minutes game, the game freezed giving the error bad subscription key analyzing it. Is it an opensource project? What did you used to make it?
item.content:encoded:
Hi, i find your name really nice but creating a lobby it’s often problematic!
There are other bugs, after a 25 minutes game, the game freezed giving the error bad subscription key analyzing it.
Is it an opensource project? What did you used to make it?
